metadata.title: Women Off Shoulder Buckle Crop Top Long Sleeve Ribbed Shirt Tee Blouse Top Vest for Causal Party Clubwear
features: SOFT & BREATHABLE: Made of 95% polyester and 5% spandex. It's soft, comfortable and no-itch for summer wear. The buckle parts are made of quality and durable plastic.
ADJUSTABLE BUCKLE: The buckles are adjustable, you can adjust it to the most comfortable feeling, and you don't have to worry about being too tight or too loose.
FEATURES: Long sleeve, slim fit, off shoulder with buckles, front zipper closure, rib-knit. Stretchy and slim design will fit your body curves better and make you look sexier.
PERFECT FOR: Causal wear, dancing, music festival costume, rave outfits, Halloween costumes, cosplay, EDM concert clothes, party attire, clubwear, sexy Mardi Gras and other events.
ALL-MATCH: Pairing it with jeans, skinny pants, casual pants, leggings, shorts, skirts and etc.
description: Your satisfaction is our goal of service. If there is any problem with the item after you get it, please free to contact us, we will try our best to resolve all the problems for you.

1) Size S: Bust = 25.98 inch, Length = 11.02 inch (Not Included The Straps), Waist = 22.04 inch, Sleeve = 20.47 inch2) Size M: Bust = 27.56 inch, Length = 11.02 inch (Not Included The Straps), Waist = 23.62 inch, Sleeve = 20.86 inch3) Size L: Bust = 29.13 inch, Length = 11.02 inch (Not Included The Straps), Waist = 25.19 inch, Sleeve = 21.26 inch
1) Material: 95% Polyester, 5% Spandex2) Weight: 0.3 pounds4) Color: Black5) Size: S, M, L6) Package: 1 x Crop Top

1) Please confirm the size carefully before ordering.2) Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement.3) The color maybe a little difference compare the image with actual item due to monitor reflect.4) If any question, leave us a message, we will keep in touch with you.
